title: No Key Fragments
body: I'm honor 5 and for the past month I have not received any key fragments. (Excluding the ones I got from honor capsules) Has anyone else got any keys recently?

replies.body: No issue currently with drop rates of hextech keys, but keep in mind that you get 12 roughly every 28 days.  The drop rate also slows down the more you get until that refresh occurs, so you may need to hang on for that!
I'm pretty sure I've gotten a lot more than 12 key fragments within 28 days.
